'''Finale of the Deep Galleries''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities. It is obtained from the [[Derelict Masonry Dock]] [[domain]].

==Lore==
{{Artifact Lore}}

==Trivia==
* Based on the description of a young girl who is apprenticed to a magical swordsman and is capable of traversing the [[Abyss]], the initial characters mentioned in this set are potentially [[Surtalogi]] and [[Skirk]].
** Skirk wears a feather closely resembling the artifact [[Deep Gallery's Distant Pact]] in her hair.
* This set describes some of the same events mentioned in Volume 4 of [[Records of Jueyun#Vol. 4|Records of Jueyun]], where the ancestor of the seelie (here referred to as the [[first angel]]) married a traveler from beyond Teyvat, leading to the downfall of the Seelie.
* The Golden City mentioned in the artifact set bears some resemblance to the ancient northern city of [[Hyperborea]], which was potentially located in what is now [[Snezhnaya]].
